𓇺 ⲓⲟϩ ⲟⲟϩ
𓇹 tell vs mound 𓇺

𓇺 was the sign for "year" in Early Uruk (and Elam?) script 𓇺 year was ligatured with 1,2,3 strokes, similar to 𓇶𓁿 to denote year #1,2,3 or season s??

𓇺 yueri yuemoon yAmmon
𓇺 yueri ⇔ yearri יָרֵחַ yaréakh
𓇺 yue i'ḥ Iah ⇔ YHWH iAh.moses Ammon
𓇺 yuemoon yaman @Japan 𓇺 mount moon mond monde
